problem_prompt: Determine the truthfulness ('True' or 'False') of the last person based on the following statements:
multiple_choice_prompt_t: Select the choice where the last person mentioned is telling the truth based on the following statements. Respond only with the label corresponding to your choice.
multiple_choice_prompt_f: Select the choice where the last person mentioned is a liar based on the following statements. Respond only with the label corresponding to your choice.
